Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Demigod and traveler of African folklore, renowned for his wit and trickery.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Cavalry Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]King and founder of the Knights of the Round Table, renowned for his virtue and chivalry.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Mighty warrior of the far North, renowned for his strength and bravery in single combat.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Demigod of superhuman strength, renowned for his famous Labors.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Religion] Civilian Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Shaman-Queen of ancient Japan, renowned for her wisdom and mystical power.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Warrior Queen of the Amazons, renowned for her leadership and martial skill.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Legendary athletes and heroes of the Maya, renowned for their power over death and the Underworld.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Orisha of winds, storms, and lightning, renowned for her extreme power.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Demigod and hero of Polynesian myth, renowned for his feats and gifts to humanity.
[ICON_Bullet]Land [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Devoted and skilled warrior, renowned for her devotion and loyalty.
[ICON_Bullet]Naval [ICON_Strength] Melee Hero.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Adventurer and fortune-hunter, renowned for his strange and marvelous travels.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit]Heavy Cavalry class Unit.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]One of Arthur's chosen Knights and strengthened by his charge.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Allows the purchasing of [ICON_Religion] Missionaries with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heroes purchased in the City gain +10% [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespan.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Allows the purchasing of [ICON_Religion] Apostles and Inquisitors with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Recalling [ICON_GreatPerson] Heroes with [ICON_Faith] Faith is at a 15% discount.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Norway, replaces the [ICON_Buildings] Stave Church.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production and +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet point per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site gains bonus standard adjacency to [ICON_Terrain] Forest.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production on [ICON_Terrain] Coastal [ICON_Charges] Resources in the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Allows the purchasing of [ICON_Religion] Apostles and Inquisitors with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Recalling [ICON_GreatPerson] Heroes with [ICON_Faith] Faith is at a 15% discount.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to Khmer, replaces the [ICON_Buildings] Temple.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+6 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+0.5 [ICON_Culture] Culture per [ICON_Citizen] Citizen in the City.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Researching the [ICON_Science] Flight Technology grants +10 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism; bonus doubled if the City has over 10 [ICON_Citizen] Population.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Allows the purchasing of [ICON_Religion] Apostles and Inquisitors with [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Recalling [ICON_GreatPerson] Heroes with [ICON_Faith] Faith is at a 15% discount.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Anunnaism / Alternate Religions: Rabbinic Judaism, Karaite Judaism, Great Church Christianity, Nestorian Christianity, Sunni Islam, Shia Islam, Zoroastrian Mazdanism, Messianic Mazdanism.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Production] Production when claiming [ICON_GreatPerson] Heroes.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Heroes gain +20% [ICON_Lifespan] Lifespan.

[ICON_Bullet]Leader Religion: Catholic Christianity / Alternate Religions: Othodox Christianity, Lutheran Christianity, Calvinist Christianity, Rodnovery, Romuva.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Majority [ICON_Religion] Religion becomes majority in Cities that lose a tile to the player's [ICON_Culture] Culture Bomb.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_District_HolySite] Holy Sites gain [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency from adjacent [ICON_District] Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Culture] Culture, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics and [ICON_GreatWork_HeroRelic] Heroic Relics.

[ICON_Bullet]Spawn Bias: Woods/Rainforest (Tier 2).[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relics, [ICON_GreatWork_HeroRelic] Heroic Relics, [ICON_GreatWork_Artifact] Artifacts, and [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Sculptures gain +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, as well as +2 [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Production] Production, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Work slots in the [ICON_Capital] Palace.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist, [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician, and [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points.
